info.title: CHIPS Money API - VAS Service Purchases
info.description:
APIs to assist integrators to test and integrate the VAS for Prepaid Mobile. 

# Features
*Get one or more prepaid merchants by criteria
*Get prepaid merchant by UUID
*Get one or more products
*Get product
*Get one or more purchases
*Create purchase
*Get purchase

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The unique reference used to identify the token request.

get.description: Get one or more merchants by criteria

parameters.name: merchantType
parameters.description: Type of merchant. Electricity or Mobile

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of entries to include per page

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order of entries. ASC or DESC

parameters.name: merchantUuid
parameters.description: The unique reference used to identify the token request.

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: Type of prepaid product. Airtime, data, sms, other, or electricity.

parameters.name: productStatus
parameters.description: Status of the product. Active or Inactive.

parameters.name: approvalStatus
parameters.description: Approval status of the product. Pending, Approved, or Rejected.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of entries to include per page

parameters.name: uuid
parameters.description: The unique reference used to identify the token request.

parameters.name: payerAccountUuid
parameters.description: The unique reference used to identify the token request.

parameters.name: productUuid
parameters.description: The unique reference used to identify the token request.
Number of entries to include per page
